abstract: Brazilian authorities investigate execution-style murders occurring in three-hour time span that killed 18 people in Sao Paolo; suspect killers are police retaliating for deadly shootings of two police officers.
lead_paragraph: The Authorities in São Paulo said Friday that they were investigating whether police officers were involved in a series of execution-style killings.

headline.main: Brazil: Police Suspected in Killings of 18
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Police Suspected in Killings of 18

snippet: The Authorities in São Paulo said Friday that they were investigating whether police officers were involved in a series of execution-style killings.
